website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance 857 v2 was lauded for its comfort and fit. Consumers also liked that the outsole was grippy. On the downside, there were complaints about the outsole peeling too soon. But in the end, the trainer delighted people looking for a reliable workout shoe.
pros: Many consumers claimed that the New Balance 857 v2 delivered an excellent fit
Numerous people stated that this version was comfortable
The grippy outsole was commended by a lot of individuals
The trainer was reasonably priced for its quality build, said multiple shoppers
cons: Many owners were not pleased that the bottom part detached from the upper after just a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile step up from the NB 623s
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear the New Balance 623 and they are great sneakers for both exercising and generally wearing as everyday footwear but I have recently moved up to these 857s which are a step up in quality in the New Balance training shoe line. I am happy I did because these have a bit more support laterally, in the heel and the arch while having slightly better cushioning in the sole. They also seem to be made of better quality materials. The do cost more than the 623s but to me they are more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rex the Cat

customer_reviews.title: cheap substitute for a formerly fine shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn 857s for nearly a decade. The rollbar technology and heel motion control helped me function with a very unstable right ankle. Shortly after the V2 came out I started having more difficulty with knee and ankle pain and increased difficulty walking. Comparing the construction, the V2 provides much less stability to the hindfool and much worse arch support. The soles are also much less durable, with my most recent pair lasting about 3 weeks. It’s horrible that they would destroy such a good product to enhance margins!
customer_reviews.author: C. Guernsey

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down hill
customer_reviews.text: 857 are supposed to be a higher quality sneaker but the last two pairs have fallen apart within months. I wear shoes to work so I don't even wear the sneakers often and I treat these as "dress sneakers" so I am not running around in the dirt. I am looking for another brand that is NOT Nike or New Balance for my next pair of sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great to find they still mkae this model
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 12 B or C; most sneakers come in D, meaning I need to add all sorts of inserts for a comfortable fit. I bought my last pair of 857 about 2 years ago, and they're toast; I am happy that NB continues to make them in the narrow width. The 857 replaced an earlier model which had been made in the USA and which ran a bit truer to size (I believe these are now made abroad, but I may be incorrect). In any case, I am very happy with this new pair. No breaking in required!
customer_reviews.author: G. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Best I have found for "motion control" side to side on your ankles.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this shoe for many years and found them one of the most comfortable shoes around if you have the need for a "motion control" shoe that will keep your ankles from rolling side to side. I also take the step of putting in better arch supports that can be bought off the shelf in most shoe stores. The ones you get with the shoes offer little arch support. I don't know why this shoe is nearly double the price of its close cousin the 608 but it is and I begrudgingly pay the additional cost as I have not found a better shoe for my 70 yr. old feet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul 1946

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 pairs of these shoes. One Blue and One Gray. The Blue pair is still good so far but, the gray fell apart on the side one one shoe. The sued came away from the rubber sole but the inside of the shoe is still in tack. I get frustrated with Amazon because you cannot return things like this after a few months. If I had purchased them in a retail store, I would take them back.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rolen

customer_reviews.title: A Good Cross Trainer, Excellent for Walking As Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the gym and after a week I'm really happy with them. I have purchased a couple of cross training shoes from New Balance in the past, probably 15 years ago, and switched over to their excellent running shoes as I wasn't that satisfied. It looks like these new models are better made with better structured soles, especially at the heel. I generally wear a 15B in dress shoes but go up a size to 16B in athletic footwear. This pair fit me perfectly with a little toe room to prevent me from jamming my toes against the front while power walking. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Will last.
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first pair over 2 years ago. I usually trash shoes in 6-12 months (Merrell, Keem, etc). 6'3, 200 lbs and I walk a mile a day in addition to my daily work in these. What you see in the photos is how they held up. I am really hard on the outside heel and these are only now starting to show wear but still feel comfortable. Have had to glue the left front a couple of times but that didn't stop me from buying a 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: D. Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Pool quality! Falling apart!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased New Balance shoes for YEARS. Normally I am happy with how long they last and how durable they are. I have had this par for about 6 weeks and have a hole in the side of the leather upper and the lace holes are tearing in multiple places. I will likely try another par but the quality is disappointing this time.
customer_reviews.author: Principal Doug

customer_reviews.title: XXXW is wider than other NB cross trainers
customer_reviews.text: I've used NB cross training shoes for years and, because of feet getting wider, I've ordered max width. With 624 model I had to get shoe stretchers to use the max width shoes. These 857 XXXW (6E) fit great out of the box. I'm really pleased with them because NB shoes I've used before (623 & 624) last for 1000+ miles walking, tennis & pickleball.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Combes

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The diamond shaped part of the tread hits me right under my second toe, at the point where it joins my foot, and is *extremely* painful after only a short time on my feet, maybe an hour or so. And I'm on my feet all day long at work. Very poor design choice by New Balance. To be honest, I ordered this shoe by mistake, but didn't realize it. And it took me too long to start wearing them so I can't return them, my fault, but wasted money as they are only good as dog toys as far as I'm concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Rishathra

customer_reviews.title: Good stable shoe for overpronating
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet. measure AA. These trainers in B width have a bit extra room but they work well for me. They replaced a set of NB runners that fit but weren't correcting my pronation. These do and my knees are grateful for it. I don't run anymore and I wanted a stable shoe for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: well-fitting shoe, stabilizing support.
customer_reviews.text: I tried a pair of New Balance for half the price of these shoes. They looked much like the 857. But when I tried to walk with them, I noticed the missing arch and heel support immediately. I like these shoes because my foot feels like "tucked in". I wouldn't want to wear any other shoes. The only draw-back is that the outside heels are too soft for my gait. I have used my replacement pair now for about three months. The heels are worn out through the first layer. But I saw that with my previous pair too, and that pair lasted until I could not wear the shoes anymore. So, I am not too worried.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Seiler

customer_reviews.title: Design change.
customer_reviews.text: New Balance changed the design on this shoe. I had 3 previous pair in a row, but this design is too small. I believe they changed contracted manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Howe

customer_reviews.title: Best Stable Walking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: If you really need a firm, stable walking shoe, this is the best shoe available. Most modern running shoes are very cushioning and your feet/legs actually bounce. My running days are over and walking/hiking is all I do. The NB *%& V2 is firm, comfortable and keeps my joints from bouncing/
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and excellent motion control
customer_reviews.text: Used for cross training. I have a major Pronation problem (anatomy plus years of stress from exercise and carrying extra weight). These shoes accomodate my Orthotics and still fit well. They cost quite a bit but are fully worth it for long term foot protection.
customer_reviews.author: Martin W. Denker

customer_reviews.title: Possible counterfeit item?
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are trash. I've been wearing them occasionally since buying them six weeks ago. Today while I was lacing them, the eyelet just ripped open. I had the exact same pair previously for 18 months without problems. I suspect the second pair are counterfeit goods and not actually New Balance shoes.
customer_reviews.author: XR

customer_reviews.title: Possibly counterfeit sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a long time purchaser of new balance sneakers and have always purchased them at my local shoe store. I thought I was getting a great deal on amazon but after a few times wearing the sneakers it’s evident these are not the same quality that I’ve purchased in the past. I actually wonder if they are even authentic new balances or if they are counterfeit. Definitely stay away!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles D.

customer_reviews.title: Support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12D. I find this pair very comfortable on my almost daily three mile walk. The style does have eye appeal to this older guy. I hope that you too will find this footwear comfortable and supportative.
customer_reviews.author: RFA MBA CPA

customer_reviews.title: Accurate size; looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I normally purchase white shoes but opted for a darker shade this time. I was not disappointed and have received several compliments. Also, the shoe is sized correctly, which is important as I have flat feet and this particular model was recommended for my feet. They feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for my old feet. I've had surgeries on both feet. My podiatrist insisted that I by New Balance cross trainers to help protect my feet. These shoes have really helped. Note: I also purchase the New Balance motion control insoles to go with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought Nike but never again
customer_reviews.text: I have always had NB but decided to try Nike. That is mistake I won't make again. They were ok but not as good as NB. They fit right out of box like a pair of shoes you have had for years. Besides, after the Kapernick mess, I did not want to be seen in Nike shoes.
customer_reviews.author: maxe

customer_reviews.title: I have been wearing these New Balance shoes for several years.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are fairly comfortable and wear well. This shoe is the same size as the previous shoes I've purchased, but this one seems slightly wider not enough to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Kray

customer_reviews.title: Is this a counterfeit shoe?
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and non supportive No absorption or support when walking or lifting weights So hard and non suppportive I actually wonder if this shoe is a counterfit The last New Balance shoe I bought --the V1 version of this, was wonderfully supportive and felt solid This feels thin, flimsy and not supportive at all
customer_reviews.author: FDH

customer_reviews.title: Used for years at Gym
customer_reviews.text: Use these shoes at my gym for elliptical, treadmill & weight training. Haven't varied from these in years. I did try another brand/type and returned them to store. I do put an after market insole into the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Edwards

customer_reviews.title: What I expect from N.B.
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, comfortable, looks good. I do prefer the all solid leather over the swade for being more rugged, but these are good too.
customer_reviews.author: D JANES

customer_reviews.title: They are still comfortable and holding up well just look a bit scuffed ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear 857's daily. They are very durable. This is my first v2 and after the third wear it's breaking in as expected. I still use my last pair of 857's (over a year old now) just for yard work or other places where appearance is not important. They are still comfortable and holding up well just look a bit scuffed up and "worn". The inner shank on these makes them more supportive than the 623's. The 623's are a good shoe with similar fit and purpose just cheaper and less supportive.
customer_reviews.author: 40-something Dad

customer_reviews.title: great shoe for my workouts.
customer_reviews.text: I finally wore out my 857v1s so ordered up the new v2. Yes, the v2 is a little different, but in spite of a number of negative reviews I am quite pleased with the new version. Note that I'm not trying to compare the two shoes. I liked the v1. I like the v2, and that's all that really matters.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the MONEY !!
customer_reviews.text: My Husband use to buy the same identical NB shoe at a well known shoe store. Sure was nice to be able to order through Amazon !! He is very pleased with the fit and is now going to order another pair in a different color. Be assured they are a great fitting shoe.
customer_reviews.author: kathy eason

customer_reviews.title: Most Stylish Shoes for My Wide Foot
customer_reviews.text: Having a wide foot, it is very hard to find shoes that actually fit. Luckily, New Balance shoots have always fitted. I've had a pair of these before and after they gave out in their normal life span, it was nice to be able to locate another pair of the exact shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Brown

customer_reviews.title: v2 a good update to the model
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the updates for the v2 are bigger changes than they made when they moved from the 856 to 857. I like the new tread pattern and outsole look. They appear to have fixed a previous issue of the sole starting to separate from the upper on the older models. Time will tell if the other weak spot, the laces, have improved from previous models, but I don't think they have changed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not like my original 857 but a close second.
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers had said about New Balance, this shoe runs a little narrow than the original 857. Worn on a 2 week cruise in EU with ave 12,000 steps per day (stesp, cobblestone etc.) and these shoes were great. I did spray a swede protector before we left.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Fit and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Replacing an old pair of New Balance shoes that were well worn and very comfortable, but no longer available. These looked to be similar, so I ordered the same size and hoped for the best. I'm pleased to report that these fit and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks great and fits as expected. My only issue is that a little of the bottom sole has come loose after only 2 months - albeit racquetball is awfully hard on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Sneaker for a Lower Cost !
customer_reviews.text: Foot ware such as this with the added support of the "roll bar" for under $100.00 is hard to come by...quality & value savings, love it !
customer_reviews.author: David G. Long

customer_reviews.title: Slip Resistant High Quality Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are slip resistant! Comes with a tag attached to the shoes expressing being slip resistant. This makes these shoes perfect for food service workers. Thank you New Balance!
customer_reviews.author: Twinrivergirls

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Our first time ordering shoes online. These fit perfectly! There is room for an additional arch support (flat feet) and he can wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: GLDavis

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I already have a pair of this type and got these as a spare. Very happy with this particular model
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe. The sole forefoot and heel are almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. The sole forefoot and heel are almost on the same plane. The left one is and the right one is almost there. Quite frankly a big improvement over my past New Balance purchases, where I would need to order multiple pairs to arrive at one good pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Version 2 Rots!
customer_reviews.text: Version 2 is a bad upgrade from Version 1 of this shoe. It is boxier in the toe area and does not fit my foot as well. Poor redesign... Should not be called an 857.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: " A GREAT BUY !" Especially for people with bad or arthritic.
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE THE BEST MADE SNEAKERS MADE, AS WELL AS SKETCHERS ! Great support for any persons feet, esp. for balance, as well as relieving any and all points of pain, per arthritis ! These are the high end of their sneakers. Thats why they cost more. Thanks Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: jeffry t. dahl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for a wide foot, not many comfortable shoes when you wear a 6E, but this is the best, over the years this is my 7th pair
customer_reviews.author: Nol

customer_reviews.title: liked it enough to get a second pair.
customer_reviews.text: The previous pair I had were white, and they fit perfectly. So I bought a pair of black. I'm thinking that I might buy a third pair for the future since the company does change designs from time to time and as long as I find one that fits me, I want to store up some more. BTW, I wear a 12.5 B.
customer_reviews.author: G. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this material
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get this type stains and won’t clean easily very disappointed how they look now
customer_reviews.author: Autounion

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and soles became unglued after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear these cross trainers often, but I find these shoes heavy and am disappointed that the soles of each shoe are becoming unglued after 6 months of minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Ed M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy and these New Balance seem to help the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Better New Balance available.
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself money and order a less expensive pair of New Balance in your size; the quality of this model has dropped each year that I ordered it. I owned at least 5 pair and they just got worse and worse. This most recent pair collapsed on the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He has a size 14 Extra Wide foot. These fit him great and are really flattering. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: The NB 857 is my go-to shoe for everyday use!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to shoe for every day use and walking. This is my third pair. I buy a new pair every two years. Please New Balance keep making this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Provided relief of foot pain
customer_reviews.text: Everyday work shoe for Level 1 Trauma Hospital ICU RN. Wide-Width provides all-day comfort and relieved the foot pain I had been experiencing with shoes designed for nurses.
customer_reviews.author: kpshdrn

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was ordered in size XXwide. It is tighter than my earlier New Balance shoes which are a size narrower
customer_reviews.author: John S Hines

customer_reviews.title: Best walking shoe for me.
customer_reviews.text: Finally New Balance got it right with version 2. Room enough in the toe box now. I tried various sizes of of the mx857 Version 1 and none of them fit. This one feels good. With the rollbar and just enough sole hardness, they make for comfortable long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Collins

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and 2 day delivery
customer_reviews.text: As I said, very comfortable. They are replacing the same model that, after 3 years, finally wore out
customer_reviews.author: AP Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sneaker ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Great for someone with big flat feet like me. I walk all day and it's because of this shoe that I can.
customer_reviews.author: Roadblock

customer_reviews.title: FULL SIZE TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: This pair of 14B NB 857’s was a full size too small! It was replaced with a pair of 15B 857’s I measured and the NEW 15’s are THE SAME SIZE AS MY OLD 14B’s
customer_reviews.author: Blochmed

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: 10 4E - tough to find - Amazon had them - have these in 2 colors - so comfortable - have nerve trouble in left foot - can't walk in many shoes - these are perfect - just the ticket! I do remove their insoles and add Dr. Scholls extreme sport insoles - perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: This is a well made excellent shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is about the fifth time I have purchased this style of New Balance shoe. I love the fit, support, and durability of this shoe. I primarily wear it when exercising or walking.
customer_reviews.author: HERITAGE UNITED METHODIST David Landers

customer_reviews.title: A solid shoe with good stability
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these before so reordered the same shoe in the same size. Everything looks good and the shoe appears to have been slightly improved in the current version with better ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Dtothe3rd

customer_reviews.title: Rollbar stabilization
customer_reviews.text: To fit full orthopedic insert with combining roll bar for best stabilizing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic New Balance Wonderfulness
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were great! The first pair had the bottom rubber/sole starting to come off after the 10th time wearing them, but the seller was fantastic at immediately sending me a replacement pair.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Morales

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish in a wide format that fits inserts
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Orthotics fit well inside. Very comfortable. Hard to find shoes wide enough for inserts that still look good, this pair fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Parabellum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear. I use them to workout in the gym and for walking. Very little break-in required.
customer_reviews.author: climber

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for fit and stability
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this style shoe for many years. I considered the NB 624 until a sales person at a retail store told me the difference. The 857 has a roll bar that prevents pronation and it also has a somewhat wider toe area which I need.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Are they worth it
customer_reviews.text: Happy as this point. Time will tell as to whether these shoes prove their worth. I normally buy the 623 shoe. These cost twice the price. Time will see if there worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Jim Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would not recommend this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shoe a little over a month before I began wearing them. I don't always wear new shoes until my old ones give out but because of a big snow storm in late April they stayed In my closet past Amazon policy on returns. They were way to tight for a size I've worn for years and also had a defective lump in the back of the shoe that made them impossible to wear as they made my foot swell up. Would think they would stretch the period a couple days but no, they deducted about 20% for returning a defective pair of shoes. I found this to be unacceptable. Definitely would not recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Was recommended to me by my foot and ankle doc due to the extra support. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyC

customer_reviews.title: good shoe, but ....
customer_reviews.text: the quality you expect from NB, but because they are all leather they are a bit stiff. I will put some mink oil on them. Make a great dress shoe
customer_reviews.author: bigaaron

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe!  Helps with my Plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Kind of expensive, but this is my second Rollbar shoe. It is amazing for my Plantar fasciitis. I was a Nike fan until I met rollbar.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: item feels like no cushion at heel
customer_reviews.text: Left shoe is tight at toe area, item feels like no cushion at heel.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes so much, they are about all he wears every day. Good support, good arches, and excellent for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight stability shoe. Normally get the 1540v2 but these are much lighter and almost same stability
customer_reviews.author: horatio

customer_reviews.title: If your foot turns in? Buy this shoe 👞!
customer_reviews.text: I have no insurance,and cannot afford orthodics. This 👞has saved my life!
customer_reviews.author: CFB

customer_reviews.title: Seller You rock A+
customer_reviews.text: My so has big feet so I love that the size was perfect and delivery was early and the style of the sneakers are great
customer_reviews.author: terray

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box. First day walked 8 miles (Fitbit) in London. Felt great the whole day. I have a pair of the same in white.
customer_reviews.author: Trip

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Have always worn the 600 series shoes, these appear to be a step up from those
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Been wearing these shoes for years. I think they ...
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these shoes for years. I think they have narrowed them up some. A little tighter then they were just a couple of years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoes for knee pain!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes my husband loves them! Helps with his knee pain. He is waiting to have knee replacement and these ease some of the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love 857 series. The suede is very nice. Not quite as sturdy as the leather version, but great nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Not narrow as described
customer_reviews.text: Not as narrow as the 900 series. Overall quality is lacking for a NB shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Good looking well made shoe but too narrow to be a 6E wife shoe so I returned them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Timely Delivery
customer_reviews.text: New Balance always works for me because they have B width. Not many athletic shoes do.
customer_reviews.author: Kaindog

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Men's Cross Trainers
customer_reviews.text: This is a newer version of the shoes I have worn for many years. the shoes fit well, I order 2E to help give width in the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Woodshoe

customer_reviews.title: Very cushioned sides, which make it narrow enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cushioned sides, which make it narrow enough for my feet. Finding 15AA is impossible so 15B was close enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: get good comfort padding
customer_reviews.text: Need to take the insoles padding out and get better ones. other then that they are good shoes. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: duane

customer_reviews.title: Design Flawed
customer_reviews.text: The plastic support where the laces go through above the "N" embroidery ripped open after 1 month of use of walking around Europe. Terrible design. Shoes should not rip open after 1 month of walking on city streets.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes, well made
customer_reviews.text: Also own the previous years model in blue. Awesome shoes, well made.
customer_reviews.author: S. Poole

customer_reviews.title: They squeak!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these shoes for several years now and this time the shoes squeak terrible. Is there anything that can be done about it?
customer_reviews.author: Linda Irgens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Husband is size 13 but takes a 14 in these. He loves the support
customer_reviews.author: tonaz

customer_reviews.title: New Balance quality has greatly diminished in recent years
customer_reviews.text: positive ;shoes have room for orthodics , good stability, negative: no cushioning for foot, must purchase high quality foot pad, quality poor, stitching and sole came a part in short period, eyelet tore out, will purchase another brand when I find one that meets my needs as the older New Balance did
customer_reviews.author: review

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and support
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality shoe for the price. I’ve used this style shoe (with the internal cross support) for several years with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... New Balance for the width and these are just great. they fit well and they are breaking in
customer_reviews.text: I buy New Balance for the width and these are just great. they fit well and they are breaking in nice
customer_reviews.author: David R. Parent

customer_reviews.title: available in narrow width
customer_reviews.text: Accommodates a B width food with good support and reasonable wear.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Goldhamer

customer_reviews.title: my favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: It has become difficult to find this, my favorite shoe. Thus, I was glad to buy this shoe and that it fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: John Crowe

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the same size as the ones I just ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same size as the ones I just wore out. Same size, same width. They seem a little larger. I'll live with them. (Maybe they'll shrink!)
customer_reviews.author: marshalljames51

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fits. Shoe very wide. Shoe pretty  Shoe good
customer_reviews.text: New Balance understands that some of us have really wide feet
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable so far
customer_reviews.text: Seem comfortable so far. Do run big compared to other new balance models
customer_reviews.author: john randazzo

customer_reviews.title: new balance shoes no longer fit as in past
customer_reviews.text: new balance has widened their shoes to the point that they are no longer comparable to past models---what a shame
customer_reviews.author: Allen L. Keim

customer_reviews.title: Love these wide shoes!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find wide shoes on Amazon. Finally found a pair for my flat feet and I love it. And this new balance is kind of stylish. Never thought I'd say that about new balance. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Btuckesh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it when shoes fit the way you want them too. These did so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: JudyB

customer_reviews.title: New Balance continues to impress me
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable and stylish. I like the blue suede for a change from just black and white. There is plenty of room for my orthotics too.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's MX857V2 Cross Trainers
product_meta.description: The best of both worlds is now at your feet. For the 857v2, stability is key with a dual density ENCAP with asymmetrical ROLLBAR. A PU molded footbed helps provide comfort, while responsive N2 technology helps provide ideal cushioning during movement. Your best begins with exceptional style and enduring performance.
feature_bullets: Medicare/HSPCS Code = PDAC A5500 Diabetic Shoes
